nodes.text: A Stormtrooper Commander of the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps was stationed on the Outer Rim world of Lothal that the Empire heavily occupied in 4 BBY. The commanding officer was assaulted and knocked out by the Jedi Kanan Jarrus, who took the stormtrooper's weapon and armor in order to blend in and make his way to towards the landing bay to rescue Minister Maketh Tua.
